meanings.definition: Paying close attention or showing interest
meanings.sent1: The attentive student listened carefully to the teacher.
meanings.sent2: She is always attentive during important meetings.
meanings.sent3: The attentive squirrel kept a watchful eye on the acorns.
meanings.sent4: His attentive gaze never wavered from the speaker.
meanings.sent5: Being attentive in class helps you learn better.

meanings.definition: Giving care or thought to something
meanings.sent1: The attentive nurse took great care of the patient.
meanings.sent2: He was attentive to every detail in his work.
meanings.sent3: The attentive gardener nurtured the plants with love.
meanings.sent4: Her attentive touch brought comfort to those in need.
meanings.sent5: Being attentive to your surroundings can prevent accidents.
